item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.
Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.

Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.

nitter.freedit.eu/Powerloom/status/1877485168241311883#m

item.title:
Holocene also live on all the @conduitxyz networks
We've upgraded to Holocene 27 @Optimism mainnets, spanning across multiple configurations
- l2/l3s - eth blobs and alt-da (@celestia and @eigen_da) - with ETH and custom gas tokens
Seamlessly âœ¨

item.dc:creator: @ratankaliani
item.description:
OP Succinct is live on mainnet today!

Has been incredible working with @PhalaNetwork and @conduitxyz (s/o to @emilianobonassi @forrestnorwood @KAndrewHuang @marvin_tong @bgmshana) on launching the first OP Stack chain secured by Succinct on Mainnet.

@PhalaNetwork has pioneered some great research into the viability of verifiable + private AI with TEE's, excited to continue to partner with them into the future.

nitter.freedit.eu/SuccinctLabs/status/1877058317115138181#m

item.title:

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: Derive has higher gas usage than both OP Mainnet and Arbitrum during volatility, and users are paying 0 in gas fees.
A lot of people didn't understand why we had to build on our own L2, but scaling 10x from where we are now wouldn't even be possible on a general purpose rollup.
item.dc:creator: @muir_eth
item.description:
Derive has higher gas usage than both OP Mainnet and Arbitrum during volatility, and users are paying 0 in gas fees.

A lot of people didn't understand why we had to build on our own L2, but scaling 10x from where we are now wouldn't even be possible on a general purpose rollup.
